data.comment: The match has started, with Braga kicking-off.
Benfica's Darwin Nunez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 2, Artur Soares Dias awards Braga a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 4, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 6, Braga have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 10, Benfica's Jan Vertonghen gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Iuri Medeiros for Braga has been booked by Artur Soares Dias and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Braga.
Braga have a goal kick.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
In the minute 18, Braga needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Benfica.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 26, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Ricardo Esgaio (Braga) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Benfica.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick Braga.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Braga.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Benfica.
Braga's Wenderson Galeno breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 38, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Iuri Medeiros.
Great play from Andre Castro to set up the goal.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Braga.
In the minute 41, Free kick Benfica.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
In the minute 45, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Benfica with the kick-off.
Braga have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Braga drives forward and Francisco Moura gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 46, Haris Seferovic is replacing Everton for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Benfica make their second substitution with Gabriel Appelt replacing Andreas Samaris.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Benfica.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Benfica throw-in in Braga's half.
In the minute 48, In Lisbon Benfica attack through Rafa Silva. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 49, Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
Francisco Moura puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Al Musrati.
In the minute 52, Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Benfica.
Throw-in Benfica.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Braga.
Nuno Sequeira (Braga) has received a yellow card from Artur Soares Dias.
Benfica attack but Haris Seferovic's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 58, Artur Soares Dias awards Braga a goal kick.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Benfica throw-in in Braga's half.
In the minute 59, Benfica to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Jorge Jesus is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Adel Taarabt replacing Pizzi.
In the minute 60, Benfica's Haris Seferovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Alex Grimaldo is on a sub for Nuno Tavares for Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 63, Goal! Francisco Moura extends Braga's lead to 0-3.
Braga have a goal kick.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Haris Seferovic keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-3.
Rafa Silva with an assist there.
In the minute 69, Haris Seferovic for the home team is judged to be offside.
The home team replace Gilberto with Diogo Goncalves.
Benfica push upfield and Haris Seferovic gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Braga defence.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 73, Joao Novais is replacing Francisco Moura for the away team.
Benfica are pushing forward but Luca Waldschmidt's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 74, Artur Soares Dias awards Braga a goal kick.
Wenderson Galeno for Braga drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Braga.
Free kick Braga.
At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica, Diogo Goncalves has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Darwin Nunez (Benfica) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Benfica throw-in in Braga's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Braga to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Goal! Benfica reduce the deficit to 2-3 through Haris Seferovic.
Alex Grimaldo instrumental with a fine assist.
Guilherme Schettine is replacing Paulinho for the away team.
In the minute 88, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in Benfica.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 89, Artur Soares Dias signals a Benfica throw-in in Braga's half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias awards Braga a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Benfica.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Braga have a goal kick.
Can Benfica capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Haris Seferovic for Benfica is whistled offside.
That's full-time at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. The final score is 2-3.
Rodrigo Gomes is on a sub for Wenderson Galeno for Braga.
The away team have replaced Iuri Medeiros with Raul Silva. This is the fourth substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
